channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- blogintroduction-wordpress-plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- blogintroduction-wordpress-plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-7862|2024-09-12T13:23:00.960Z -- unknown -- blogintroduction-wordpress-plugin
item.description: The blogintroduction-wordpress-plugin WordPress plugin through 0.3.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-7862|2024-09-12T06:00:06.592Z -- unknown -- blogintroduction-wordpress-plugin
item.description: The blogintroduction-wordpress-plugin WordPress plugin through 0.3.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
